suite.name: Tasks

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=get_user_data, url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users path_url=/users headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

C:\Users\Markus\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\lib\site-packages\urllib3\connectionpool.py:1043: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made to host 'jsonplaceholder.typicode.com'. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/1.26.x/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings warnings.warn(

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
